name: Tiny House
description:
There are 14 rooms, each concealing riddles and collectible objects, waiting to be unraveled by you. Whether you're new to escape games or a seasoned adventurer, the diverse puzzles will captivate you.

All packed into a cute 3D isometric style, Tiny House is completely free to play, no In-app purchases are needed to complete the rooms. You can still remove Ads and support the development with an IAP of your choice.

Experience the captivating 3D graphics that set Tiny House apart, blending classic point-and-click adventure with modern room escape mechanics

Tiny House is available in English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Russian, Japanese, Korean, and Portuguese. The game language automatically changes based on your OS language settings.

Don't forget to let your friends know how far you've gone on the game, they may want to compete with you in this exciting escape room experience!

- What's an escape room game?
In an escape game, you aim to break free from a trapped location by employing skill, patience, and logical thinking. By examining and interacting with objects, you gather clues and items essential for solving puzzles and ultimately escaping the room.
